text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
It's summer! And summer means<n>beach! And beach means
training<n>camp! Full speed ahead! Off to camp!<n>Go, go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Summer is here, and with it the<n>summer training camp. Our
bus sets<n>out. Its destination: the sparkling<n>seaside.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
No duh! This summer is my big<n>chance! ♪ By the time we
get back,<n>I'm gonna be faster than Prez!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I'll be so strong, she'll be shocked,<n>and shower me with
praise, and pat<n>my head, and oh yeah! You'll be<n>proud of
me too, won't you?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
So once we're there, hit me with the<n>roughest regimen you
got! Oh, but<n>before that... ♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Time for a song! 'Scuse me, could<n>you pass the mic? This
is number one<n>Teio, singing her number one song!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Afterwards, Teio dives right in to her<n>summer training with
the same<n>passion that she sang karaoke with.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Bam bam bam bam! Beach dashes<n>are too easy! I could do
this all day!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, how's my form? Make sure<n>you're paying
attention. I'm counting<n>on you, all right?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
A slope! Mountain trails are always<n>all bumpy and fun!
C'mon, let's go,<n>with a hop, skip, and a jump!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: You are coming, aren't you? It'sno fun alone. Once we get to the top,we can have a picnic!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, after that run I'm in the mood<n>for fireworks! Look,
Trainer, I'm a<n>spinny firework! Spinny spin spin!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! You're supposed to jump up<n>and down! Like
this—hup, hah, whoo! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's making the most of training<n>camp, that's for sure.
And I'm along<n>for the entire exhilarating ride...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Morning! Let's keep up the energy<n>today! Whoo! More
running together,<n>and swimming, and...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Trainer? Traineeer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: When I come to, I find myself lying on<n>the cold wooden floor.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer, you're awake. You<n>scared me to death, fainting
like that<n>all of a sudden.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Like thirty minutes? So training's not<n>over yet! If we pick up
the pace, we<n>can make up for lost time. Today's<n>gonna be
fun! ♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But why'd you pass out anyway?<n>Not enough sleep?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I know! You were so excited, you<n>couldn't sleep, and
played games all<n>night? Hehe, I'm kinda guilty of that<n>
too...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
What's with the silent treatment?<n>Was I spot on? Heh,
sleepovers are<n>always exciting, aren't they?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But wait a sec... Trainer, I didn't think<n>you were the type to
get all hyper.<n>Yeah, that doesn't seem like you...<n>Ah!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Was it my fault you passed out?<n>Because I've been
draggin you<n>around?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Oh, so that's why... I totally forgot<n>you're not an
Umamusume. Thanks<n>for sticking it out...
choice_data_list: No worries. C'mon, we've got training to do...
No worries. C'mon, we've got training to do...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We can't afford to take a day off. Her<n>ambition wouldn't
allow it anyway.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Just gotta fight through it...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Trainer... I'll take today off.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Don't "huh" me! I said, I'll take todayoff, and I mean it! The whole day!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Look how pale you still are—you'll get<n>sick if you move
around. So I've<n>made up my mind. No training today!
choice_data_list: But if you want to catch up to the president...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Nngh... Well, we might fall a bit behind<n>on that goal, but
that's okay!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Without you tagging along, there's no<n>one to train me
anyway. Plus, it... just<n>wouldn't be like me.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I dunno exactly what, but something<n>about it just doesn't
feel right. Prez<n>would probably go off on her own no<n>
problem...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But I'd rather go with company. I<n>mean...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Amidst the summer heat and the<n>buzzing of the cicadas,
Teio voices her<n>honest thoughts.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
What I really want is to have fun. Just<n>winning isn't
enough—I want to win in<n>style, with pride, and be praised for
it.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Just like when I got a perfect score<n>on that dance game. I
want to share<n>the moment. With my friends, and<n>you.
Plus...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Well, who knows what kind of trouble<n>I'll run into down the
road. I mean, I'm<n>pretty invincible, but there are hurdles<n>
even I can't get over alone.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Like, remember when I lifted way too<n>much weight, and you
stepped in to<n>help? Just like that.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Prez might be fine all by herself, but Ithink being with other people is whatmakes me me, if that makessense.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Which is all to say, I can't do this<n>without you. I'd fail so
fast. So, um...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Let's take it easy today, yeah?<n>Ahem. Maybe you should
pace<n>yourself a little, Trainer.
choice_data_list: My own words used against me...
My own words used against me...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you remembered. Well, that's<n>payback! ♪ Thanks to
you, I learned<n>not to push myself too hard, so now<n>it's
your turn!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh! How about I give you a massage<n>this time?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Here goes! Tickle tickle tickle!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For a moment, we forget all about<n>training and simply have
fun. And<n>once the moment has passed...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer, since we're taking<n>today off, I have an idea...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Wanna check out tonight's festival? I<n>bet it'll be tons of fun.
Right? Right?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yay! It's decided then! All right, let's<n>play and eat the night
away!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, everything's so bright and<n>sparkly! Hey hey, Trainer!
Let's buy<n>some masks and try them on! Which<n>one do
you want?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Two masks, please! I'll take the pink<n>Hangout Ranger
mask!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her cheerful voice seems to rise<n>above the clamor. Running,
playing,<n>laughing—Teio dashes through her<n>summer
training camp in style.
